reference.shortdesc: A message phrase is the text of a message that is produced by an application or program.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The msgph element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the software domain module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the msgph element can be used to tag a message that is returned by the server:
example.codeblock: A server log entry of I:0 is equivalent to the text message, informational: successful.
